status.expert_value: با موفقیت تامین مالی شده است

evaluations.basic_explanation: The HTML content clearly states "اتمام مالی موفق" (completion of successful funding) and "با موفقیت تامین مالی شده است" (successfully funded). These phrases indicate the project has been successfully funded, which aligns with the 'status' field. Group 1 incorrectly reports NULL/NOT_FOUND, as the status is explicitly mentioned in the text. Both Group 2 and 3 provide accurate translations of the project's funding status.
